original_text: A bronze altar stood in front of the Lord's temple to bring sacrifices to him. Now it stood between the new altar and the front of the temple. So Ahaz moved it away from there. He put it on the north side of the new altar.
korean_text: 또 여호와의 앞 곧 성전 앞에 있던 놋제단을 새 제단과 여호와의 성전 사이에서 옮겨다가 그 제단 북쪽에 그것을 두니라

sentences.original_text: A bronze altar stood in front of the Lord's temple
sentences.korean_translation: 놋제단이 주의 성전 앞에 서 있었다

sentences.original_text: Now it stood between the new altar
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 그것은 새 제단 사이에 서 있었다

sentences.original_text: and the front of the temple
So Ahaz moved it away from there
He put it on the north side
